ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Rubi
ygData.msgSnippet: Seriously doubt it. The Rubicite drops in Najena were temporary, as a sort of prelude to the Historic Quest that was run a few weeks ago. After the quest, the
ygData.messageBody:
Seriously doubt it. The Rubicite drops in Najena were temporary, as a sort
of prelude to the Historic Quest that was run a few weeks ago. After the
quest, the rubicite drops stopped and Najena reverted back to the old
boring dungeon we are all used to. And to my knowledge, that historic quest
has been run on all servers.

So to offer a simple answer to a simple question: No. =)

Timn the Enchanter
Illusionist of the 54th somethingorother
Erollisi Marr

At 11:08 AM 09/26/2000 -0600, you wrote:
>Is Rubicite still dropping in Najena? Or anywhere else for that matter?
>
>Thanks.
>
>--
>Uthanatos
>
>
>
>
>
================================
Ean Travis
